timeline.bodyText: what is this doing? Running tests twice?
timeline.author: frankgh

replies.bodyText: It's been removed now. I have seen some green builds with only one attempt, but we should still keep an eye on this. It looks to be kind of flaky right now.
replies.author: oliverralbertini

timeline.message:
Update pg_regress pipeline

The pg_regress pipeline had become a bit stale and these changes help
bring it back up to speed.

Authored-by: Oliver Albertini <oalbertini@pivotal.io>
